effect_entries.effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  In high gear, allows the trainer to hop over some rocks and ascend muddy slopes.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ランニングシューズ　よりも
速く　走ることが　できる
折りたたみ式の　じてんしゃ。

A folding Bicycle that enables a rider
to get around much faster than a pair
of Running Shoes will allow.

Bici pieghevole che permette di spostarsi
più velocemente che con le Scarpe da Corsa.

Ein Klapprad, mit dem man schneller ist
als zu Fuß.

Une Bicyclette pliable permettant de se déplacer
bien plus rapidement qu’en marchant.

러닝슈즈보다도
빨리 달릴 수 있는
접이식 자전거다.

ランニングシューズ　よりも
はやく　はしることが　できる
おりたたみしきの　じてんしゃ。

A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

Une Bicyclette pliable permettant de se
déplacer plus rapidement qu’avec les
Chaussures de Sport.

A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

A folding Bicycle that enables much
faster movement than the Running
Shoes.

A folding bicycle that allows
faster movement than the RUNNING
SHOES.

A folding bicycle
that is faster than
the RUNNING SHOES.
